855c94d3-31df-4583-84e3-066551c24cf4.name: 战斗反射
855c94d3-31df-4583-84e3-066551c24cf4.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

87af3710-c687-48fa-91c0-9baa2ffc6381.name: 健康
87af3710-c687-48fa-91c0-9baa2ffc6381.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

e2d6dc7a-1f2f-4872-b5eb-5ca9562b102a.name: Fit, Very
e2d6dc7a-1f2f-4872-b5eb-5ca9562b102a.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

0c98cb82-09e6-4471-8c92-3dbe4e0b2cf5.name: 高痛阈
0c98cb82-09e6-4471-8c92-3dbe4e0b2cf5.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

c019c4ce-c951-4b57-be60-0a9e18dce69d.name: 幸运
c019c4ce-c951-4b57-be60-0a9e18dce69d.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

240145ed-8e09-456d-8d23-479861dec57a.name: 易于命中
240145ed-8e09-456d-8d23-479861dec57a.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

49c7e439-3ef8-40b1-a19c-9ab38410d657.name: 标志性装备
49c7e439-3ef8-40b1-a19c-9ab38410d657.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

94b2e834-3787-4a25-b3a9-a4e99b6201b4.name: Weapon Bond
94b2e834-3787-4a25-b3a9-a4e99b6201b4.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

49b57693-c1f3-4d16-8264-f15baf0db535.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

514c1810-ea3c-4a8e-8b19-ba50d2c56262.name: Heroic Archer
514c1810-ea3c-4a8e-8b19-ba50d2c56262.notes: Reduce arrow ready time by one round with roll/penalty and Acc bonus without aiming or ignore bulk

db00d67c-ead5-4bc5-9ce8-7dd9774f4ecc.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

ea635b4c-bd9f-45a5-a08f-098b60dd52c0.name: 社会污名（逐出家族，非继承人）

cf18b77f-ab97-4d61-8bd0-b975e1f563d6.name: Vow (Own no more than what can be carried)

80078529-96f8-442e-9d06-a512a8b2648b.name: 8 points in improving primary or secondary skills, or:

8d4683fa-c233-4e0b-b07d-b65b6bb739c2.notes: 把伤害类型改为贯通并将护甲除数提高到（2）.

9c6cb06b-29e0-4d08-a66f-4de606c84986.notes: +1 to Stealth vs Vision in specified environment

7eb5c651-434c-4923-8f62-4ab5b7d25311.notes: Changes damage to piercing with armor divisor of (2); +20% range
